segments.text: Hello , sir , what can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I need a new suit . I have an important interview next week , so I really need to look sharp .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem ! We have a broad selection of suits , all tailored made so that it will fit perfectly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I want a three piece suit , preferably made from Italian cashmere or wool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well sir . Would you like to have some shirts made also ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I â€™ ll also take some silver cuff link and a pair of silk ties .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Now , if you will accompany me , we can take your measurements and choose the patterns for your suit and shirts .
segments.speaker: S1
